{% endif %} {% endfor %}

settings.title: Product Description
settings.content: Adventure awaits with our sustainable Adventure Pants. Featuring 11 IntuPockets™, DWD™ tech, quick-dry fabric with Bio-finish wash tech, lightweight design, and water resistance. Versatile, durable, and ready for any activity.

settings.title: Shipping Info
settings.content: Free World-Wide shipping on orders over $150 with a 14-day return policy & 30-day free exchanges for every order. International duties & taxes may apply and are not calculated at checkout unless stated. Orders to US/CA ship within 1-2 business days, AU - 7-15 business days.

settings.title: Materials
settings.content:
• 92% Recycled plastic Polyamide 
  • 8% Elastic Spandex (Elastan) for that super unlimited traveler movement
  • Washed with BioFinish™ tech for stain-repellent & waterproof properties
  • Waterproof double-stitch zippers

settings.title: Returns, Exchanges & Warranty
settings.content:
Not happy? No worries! We offer a 14-days return policy after the date of delivery. Need to exchange? no problem, no questions asked we have a 30 day free exchange policy.

You can do it right Here

We offer a 1-year warranty against manufacturing defects. All information can be found here on this page. Had a problem? Feel free to contact us directly via email at support@apricoat.com

Important: Pre-order items and discounted-orders: Items purchased while on pre-order status or with 20%+ discount are nonrefundable. Don’t worry, though! You can still exchange them for a different size or return for store credit!

settings.title: See Features
settings.description: Move slider to change positions, Click circles to learn more.

settings.title: Everywhere Anytime
settings.subheading:
BioFinish™ tech stain-repellent & waterproof properties
to keep your pants fresh every where you go.

settings.title: we had a dream
settings.description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s.

settings.title: The beginning
settings.text: Apricoat was born from a group of international explorers who wanted to make the ultimate high-quality, eco-friendly traveling gear. For mont

settings.title: Crowdfunding
settings.text: The $2.2M success of Apricoat's first crowdfunding campaign was the next step from a boutique one-product brand to a vision come true - a top-tier eco-friendly traveling gear brand with many traveling solutions that helps reach new limits.

settings.title: Young successful brand
settings.text: We had many obstacles on our way, from long designing periods to canceling some that were just not - enough. Today, we are proud to say - the hard work paid off. The ultimate thoughtful traveling gear is here to stay and extend.

settings.title: It’s all thanks to you
settings.text: From a dream, to design, through $2+ Million Backer's Funding, some mistakes, new designs, and many tests, we are proud to say Apricoat is leading the eco-friendly traveling gear to extend your future adventures.

settings.title: Can I wash it in a washing machine?
settings.text: Yes, you can. please follow the instructions on the pants label for further guidelines and clarification on how to best wash them

settings.title: What fabric are the Adventure Pants made out of?
settings.text:
92% Recycled plastic Polyamide 

8% Elastic Spandex (Elastan) for that super unlimited traveler movement

Washed with BioFinish™ tech for stain-repellent & waterproof properties

Waterproof double-stitch zippers

settings.title: Are they tight enough so they won’t fall trekking?
settings.text: Yes, and - you also have belt loops you can easily adjust the right tightness.

settings.title: What is the recommended temperature range for the Adventure Pants?
settings.text: The recommended temperature range is all around. since it will vary from person to person as everyone's tolerance to the cold is different. When we tested them at -20c we had thermal leggings underneath and it was perfect, and in hot weather, desert checks it felt great as well so - to make a long answer short - any weather.
